tag_list: online-advertising, social-gaming, social-network, cto, local-online-advertising, entrepreneur
overview:
“Ketan Shah is a successful serial entrepreneur. Mr. Shah was CTO of YellowPages.com for 5 years, where he joined the company at founder level and played important roles in guiding technical teams, establishing YellowPages.com as a leading IYP, assembling multi-national teams, automating sales and operations and finalizing the sale of the company to SBC and BellSouth.

Prior to Yellowpages.com, Mr. Shah was founder and CEO of Sales-Watch.com, which he merged with YellowPages.com in 2000. Before that, he worked for multiple start-ups. Mr. Shah has consulted for clients like Austin-Hayne, HP, BroadVision and Amgen.”

(Source: Weblistic)
